Text: Är den på Japanska eller engelska?

Can anyone confirm this being CC?

If so, joeylo is the greatest man alive.
confirmed. real and working, no password required

Using Dark-Alex's 3.51. Doesn't work. I get a black screen after selecting New Game.

If I press start the word pause appears, but I can't continue the game.

Of course it's Japanese. The game hasn't been translated yet. It only came out this month. Patience, people. Either that, or learn Japanese, since the original game is always better. It's just one of those cost vs. benefit things, depends on how willing you are to learn a new language.

I'm somewhat impressed that Crisis Core is already ripped and being distributed, in any case. Is it any good? I'd play it just for the story, but...
